CustomField.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Business_Development', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Product_Integrations' ), OR( CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Core API'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'USDC Express'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Accounts API'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Crypto Deposits'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Crypto Payouts'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Read Only API'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Verite'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'PSP Crypto Settlement'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Programmable Wallets'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Smart Contract Platform'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Gas Station'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Cybavo VAULT'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Cybavo Cashflow Manager'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'CCTP'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Bridged USDC Standard'), CONTAINS(Products_Selected__c, 'Alt Mempool') ) )
CustomField.label: Product Opportunity
